userreviews.userReview: My mom sang this to me when I was a little boy - will always associate this song with her.

“YOU ARE MY SUNSHINE” by Jimmie Davis is an animated version of the children’s song. I had no clue it was a book until I walked into Barnes and Nobel and saw it with my own eyes. It’s a literal take on the children’s song that we all know and love. Little children hold onto their teddy bears and sing them the song. I had never pictured the song to be about a child singing to their toy but it is a darling little book.	 Something I really liked about this book was the way the text was laid out. Because we want to sing it when we read it, it is laid out in a way that makes that possible. The words flow in waves on the page and swirl around the illustrations for a fun reading experience. Sometimes the text stands out boldly against the pages, while other times it calmly stays in the background and lets the picture speak of itself. The cover is a perfect example of how the words fit around the illustration! 	Another thing that really caught my eye in this book were the illustrations. The children with huge heads and little smiles are adorable to me! The bears also have huge heads and little facial features, which I just can’t get over. I think the illustrator’s style was captured perfectly in this book, but at the same time the illustrations are not distracting from the text or song as a whole. Rather, they add to the overall experience of the book and make it a great children’s book for all ages.

I chose this book for one of the baby and toddler books. I love reading this story to babies and toddlers because it is short enough that it keeps their attention. The pages are also shiny and bright with pictures of a young child that they love looking at and the book can be sung as well as read. This is an adorable story to enjoy with children. The children also love just looking at the book.

This book was excessively cute, but in this case excessive was a good thing. I loved the board book style that makes it so easy to read with toddlers. The illustrations were also very adorable. The pictures, plus having the words of the song written on the page make this book a fun learning activity. I can definitely see myself reading this with me kids.

This simple board book is a good companion for the song "You are my sunshine." The words follow the lyrics of the song exactly so a caregiver could sing or read the story. The pictures are simple and appealing to toddlers. Each 2-page spread shows a different child with their favorite stuffed animal. A very sweet, but simple book for caregivers to share with their little ones.
What a lovely book. Sang it together as a unison read during my toddler storytime.

1. Awards: Jimmie Davis was awarded the Grammy Hall of Fame for this song2. Grade Level: Preschool to Kindergarten3. Summary: This song book expresses the love someone has for another by comparing them to sunshine. The illustrations explain the song through a child’s love for his/her stuffed animal. The children are shown cuddling, playing with, and falling asleep with their stuffed animal. 4. Review: Calling someone sunshine is such a beautiful metaphor because the sun is one of the brightest and warmest thing in existence. The illustrations are child-friendly which makes the song book relatable to children. It is a warm song that any person at any age would love. 5. Possible In-Class Use: Children could create their own stuffed animal out of paper. They could cut out each part of the body and glue them together. They would cut out the head, body, arms, legs, nose, ears, eyes, tail. Once they are finished putting it together, then they can glue it onto a stick. This activity fosters creativity, imagination, motor skills, and they can practice making shapes the same size. Another in-class use, which also can tie to the previous activity would be to have the children sing this song as a chorus holding their sticks with their animal of choice. Their family and/or friends can come and watch. There would also be snacks and drinks for the audience. This allows children to gain comfort in the classroom with each other and builds a bond with the children’s families to get everyone together.

Awards- noneGrade- Pre-KThis book is a great book for young children. The children in the book are showing the reader how much they love their teddy bears. The book is short but it is heartfelt. The book is a hard cardboard that is durable for young children. The song that goes along with the book is catchy and very simple, which makes it easy for young children to learn quickly.You are my sunshine is a wonderful book to read to a child that you love and care for. The illustrations are well drawn. This book can be relatable to little children because they may have a stuffed animal that they love and care for very much and they may sing the song to them. In the classroom this book can be read and sung to the children before nap time in a preschool or daycare. It can be nice a relaxing for them to calm down and sing a song. Another classroom activity is to have each child draw a picture of something or someone that they love very much after reading the book as a class.

1) Awards: None 2) Grades Preschool 3) This book has the chorus to the song “You are my sunshine” with pictures of children and their teddy bears.4) I like this book because it is simple. It has simple pictures with little to no background detail and simple depictions of the children and their teddies. It is a board book with thick pages which is great for small hands to turn. 5) This book is great for small children, in class it can be used with the song or with just the teacher and class singing the chorus. It can help children see the connection between the words of the song and the words on the page. It can also help to talk about emotions and make connections between self and text. The song talks about being happy and how someone in their life makes them happy when they are sad.

If you like to sing to your children, this is a good book to sing to them. The pages are made of thick cardboard material, so toddlers might not chew through them quite as fast as paper. The lyrics are well known and it's a fun tune for kids to learn. The pictures were very nice and friendly as well.
These books have been a favorite with my babies. Very easy to sing to your infant. A great purchase.

Sing along with the song by the same title as you flip through this sturdy board book. Large pictures and big typography combine for easy reading. Easy to grip for little hands and big pictures that are easy to see.

We love books that have fun and uplifting illustrations for some of our favorite songs. This is a book that makes it easy to share an old favorite with children1*Talking points: what makes you happy when you are blue? What can you do to make others happy when they are blue? What makes you blue?

This book is twelve pages of board book fun. It follows 6 different children as they play with their teddy bears and sing the well-known nursery rhyme to them. With great illustrations that convey much love and feeling, children of all ages will love this book and read it time and time again. Caroline Jane Church has authored or illustrated over 90 books; my children have loved all of them that we have read. This book is part of a new series based upon known nursery rhymes with the first two titles being The More We Get Together and You Are My Sunshine. With shiny metallic covers children are immediately attracted to the books. They are books young children in your life will love to have read to them and to learn to read with.Read the review and with links to other reviews of books by the author on my blog Book Reviews and More.

The lyrics to the popular song with adorable illustrations. I love this illustrator. Each page spread shows an adorable young child with a special lovey toy. This book can be read as the reader (most likely a parent or other loving relative) expressing her love, or as the children expressing their love for their special toys. I liked that idea. I read this hoping to find another book by this illustrator to use as a special birth day book for my second child, but I felt this wasn't specific enough like How Do I Love You? and I Love You Through and Through are. Might change my mind though. I did about the former and have greatly enjoyed reading it with Natalie.

Maybe I am missing something here.We all love the "You Are My Sunshine" song, so that's why I got this book. But it is literally just the first verse of the song with nothing special illustrations along side it. There is not much to it. The words are just "You are my sunshine my only sunshine you make me happy when skies are grey you'll never know dear how much I love you please dno't take my sunshine away. Please don't take my sunshine away." I mean they could've at least included the second verse...

This was a great book. The song is familiar of course but the illustrations told a story that was touching to me and made me feel warm and loved. I feel like it teaches children you love them from the lyrics but also the illustrations portray that too. I loved the illustrations as they were drawn too. There was lots of color to them and it added to the feeling that it brought. I would recommend this to all parents because of the message it brings.

I really thought that this was a cute book. I really like the way they had the drawings done. I think that this is a cute book for little kids, because as you read the book they can sing the famous song. They are able to act out this song how they want to make it more interactive and fun. I think that this would even be a great book for kids even as young as 5 years old.

We have a number of books illustrated by Charlotte Church and they are vibrant, fun and kid-friendly. My daughter loves any books that we can sign to her, so this is a big hit in our house... and a great soothing go-to-sleep song.

I always sang this song to Bobo when I was trying to soothe him or lull him to sleep. The book takes a different look at this song by making a tribute to loveys everywhere. I love the illustrations and the cover is shiny to attract little eyes.
a cute board book with the opening verse of you are my sunshine showing kids with their teddy bears and being very grateful for their stuffed friend.

description: Illustrated by the best-selling artist, Caroline Jayne Church, finally this classic song is becoming a children's board book!You are my sunshine, my only sunshine.You make me happy when skies are gray.Lovingly illustrated by Caroline Jayne Church, the bestselling artist from I LOVE YOU THROUGH AND THROUGH, this is the first of her new three book song series. YOU ARE MY SUNSHINE has become well-known and well-loved by parents and children everywhere. Using the uplifting chorus, this board book with a foil cover is perfect for Valentine's Day, Mother's Day, Father's Day, or any day!
